summary: This test module validates the DeepSpeed strategy integration within Lightning Fabric, covering configuration selection, optimizer setup, precision handling, activation checkpointing parameters, environment variable behavior, initialization across different DeepSpeed stages, multi‑GPU execution, handling of multiple models, and checkpoint save/load functionality.
business_intent: To guarantee that DeepSpeed works reliably with Lightning Fabric across various configurations and hardware setups, providing users confidence that training, precision, and checkpointing features behave correctly.
